title: Closer
lyrics:
Shwiun geon jaemieopseo
Geugeon nado ara
Geuraeseo deo tamina
Sumgil suga eopseo
Jom aseuraseulhan neowa na
Geunyang waenji kkeullyeo iyuneopseo



Hangeoreum deo gamyeon

Neon tto 2 steps back

Ginjangeun hajima

Nal jageukalppun (geochireojin sumsori)

Geochireojin sumsori

Geochireojin sumsori



Saehayan geon waenji

Deo muldeurigo shipeun geureon mam ara

Ni sunjinan eolgure sumeun pyojeong

Gunggeumhaejijana Oh



Hangeoreum deo gamyeon

Neon tto 2 steps back

Ginjangeun hajima

Nal jageukalppun (geochireojin sumsori)

Geochireojin sumsori

Geochireojin sumsori



Neoreul bolsurok deo chameul suga eomneun geol

Oh oh oh oh

Oneul bam neoreul matgyeobwa

Sumeun sangsangeul kkaeweo i sungan



Ttaeroneun daeul deut mal deut

Neol haetaeuge hago

Ttaeroneun pogeunhi

Nae pume neol ana



Sumi danneun sungan

Hanadweneun neowa na

Oh



Hangeoreum deo gamyeon

Neon tto 2 steps back

Ginjangeun hajima

Wae nareul pihae (jogeumman deo gakkai)

Jogeumman deo gakkai

Jogeumman deo gakkai
